alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rogue Valley; Siskiyou Mountains (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 08 at 10:46PM PDT until August 09 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 9 PM PDT TUESDAY FOR STRONG GUSTY WIND AND LOW RH FOR PORTIONS OF FIRE WEATHER ZONES 621 AND 622... * Impacts: Strong, gusty wind with low relative humidity and critically dry vegetation will greatly increase the spread potential of any new and existing fires. * Affected area: In Southwest OR...Eastern Fire Weather Zone 621 and southeastern Fire Weather Zone 622, including Ashland, Grizzly Peak, Siskiyou Summit, and Mt. Ashland. * Wind: Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Humidity: As low as 10 percent. * View the hazard area in detail at: https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
